user.description: This integration allows you to manage Matter device bindings. Make sure the Matter integration is configured before proceeding.

telemetry.title: Help Improve Matter Compatibility
telemetry.description:
Share anonymized device information to help build a database of Matter device capabilities. This data helps suggest compatible binding targets and improves the integration for everyone.

**What we collect:**
- Vendor and product information (manufacturer names, model IDs)
- Device capabilities (supported clusters, device types)
- Hardware/software versions

**What we never collect:**
- Device names or labels you've assigned
- Room/area information
- Any personally identifiable information
